Enum PrintClientUtils

    public enum PrintClientUtils
extends java.lang.Enum<PrintClientUtils>
    Handles the necessary steps for printing on the client.
    Author:
    Federico Alcantara

      • print

        public boolean print(Context context,
                     java.lang.String deviceAddress,
                     java.io.InputStream input,
                     Resources resources,
                     SharedPreferences preferences)
              throws java.net.ConnectException
        Prints the given input to the device, performing all required conversion steps.
        Parameters:
        context - Android context.
        deviceAddress - address of the bluetooth device.
        input - Input data as a stream.
        resources - Application resources.
        preferences - Shared preferences of the application.
        Returns:
        True if print job is processed.
        Throws:
        java.net.ConnectException

      • serializeServiceName

        public java.lang.String serializeServiceName(java.lang.String name,
                                             java.lang.String address,
                                             java.lang.String selection)
        Serializes the service name for sending the information to the server.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the device.
        address - Address of the device.
        selection - Driver selected.
        Returns:
        Serialized name / driver combination.
